posts.post_content:
A potential 6/6 for 7CC that can sac himself to deal power damage? Better than people suspect, I think. Combine this guy with something as simple as a [Firebreathing](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Firebreathing), and you've got a bomb on your hands.
  
   
At least 3.5/5, possibly better in the right deck.

At least 3.5/5, possibly better in the right deck.

Posted By: Prince_Ava (5/19/2010 4:04:43 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I think this guy gets overlooked in the Gruul guild a bit.  
Rumbling Slums take care of your bloodthirsting needs.  
  
Dragon Breath, Rancor, and cards like Might of Oaks work very well with him.  
Hit, then sac for extra damage, especially with a Rancor.  
  
If your Gruul deck has already done it's job, he could very easily end a game.  
  
3.5/5

Posted By: jam_marie (8/26/2012 7:24:57 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: So, a lot of people are on this guy for his high cost and I guess weakness of needing to wait for a second turn. However, with all the green mana boosters (or cards like Elvish Piper), the mana cost isn't an issue. Also, there are plenty of cards that can grant cards like him with haste, therefore allowing a simultaneous access to his sac ability. And to close, to get the blood thirst, as I understand it, the damage can come from any source, so why not cast a lightning bolt or shock to grant the damage? I'm rebuilding my Gruul deck with some major differences and it's going to be mostly focused on the few copies I have of this guy. Junkyo Bell anyone?
posts.html:
So, a lot of people are on this guy for his high cost and I guess weakness of needing to wait for a second turn. Also, there are plenty of cards that can grant cards like him with haste, therefore allowing a simultaneous access to his sac ability. And to close, to get the blood thirst, as I understand it, the damage can come from any source, so why not cast a lightning bolt or shock to grant the damage? I'm rebuilding my Gruul deck with some major differences and it's going to be mostly focused on the few copies I have of this guy. Junkyo Bell anyone?
